title: 怎么播放这些声音和粒子
author: SilentSkyShine
txt_content:
怎么播放这些声音和粒子?
1.恶魂死的声音
2.远古守卫者的那个
3.走路的声音
版本1.11.2，我要做恐怖地图

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
/playsound entity.ghast.death music @p
/playsound entity.elder_guardian.death music @p

走路的应该是这类
block.glass.step
block.anvil.step
block.cloth.step
block.grass.step
block.gravel.step
block.ladder.step
block.metal.step
block.sand.step
block.slime.step
block.snow.step

block.stone.step
block.wood.step

还有其他实体的走路....
entity.chicken.step
entity.cow.step
entity.endermite.step
entity.horse.step
entity.horse.step_wood
entity.irongolem.step
entity.pig.step
entity.sheep.step
entity.silverfish.step
entity.skeleton.step
entity.spider.step
entity.wolf.step
entity.zombie.step
entity.zombie_villager.step

自己按格式填进去就是了...
/playsound 音乐名字 music @p

replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content:
在sound文件里找
/playsound 文件位置 music @p
